channel.title: Comments on: The Return of the Sister

item.title: By: Kontract
item.dc:creator: Kontract
item.description:
<blockquote>Oh god, the stupid pet names, you could tell who her favourite person was in the guild who she was stalking at the time because she would have a pet named after him.</blockquote>
You're just jealous cos she never named one after you, aren't you?
item.content:encoded:
Oh god, the stupid pet names, you could tell who her favourite person was in the guild who she was stalking at the time because she would have a pet named after him.

You’re just jealous cos she never named one after you, aren’t you?

item.description: Oh god, the stupid pet names, you could tell who her favourite person was in the guild who she was stalking at the time because she would have a pet named after him.
item.content:encoded: Oh god, the stupid pet names, you could tell who her favourite person was in the guild who she was stalking at the time because she would have a pet named after him.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Our hunter-sister is in her mid 30s, so unless she was passing herself off as a young girl to your guild, there's an epidemic and I recommend panic.
Ryan, we're full on gnomes. :)
item.content:encoded:
Our hunter-sister is in her mid 30s, so unless she was passing herself off as a young girl to your guild, there’s an epidemic and I recommend panic.

Ryan, we’re full on gnomes. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description: Not forgetting a big cuddly fluffy namable pet, Ghiest ;)
item.content:encoded: Not forgetting a big cuddly fluffy namable pet, Ghiest ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Ghiest
item.dc:creator: Ghiest
item.content:encoded:
If that were the case my guild wouldn’t eternally be looking for ‘locks

Here have one of mine, no actually have 4 ðŸ™‚

This ‘hunter-sister’ sounds strangely like someone we had in our guild but left do to being harrassed after posting her pic on our legendary picture forum thread combined with myspace link. I would say it’s quite co-incidental but im sure there is something about the stereo-type of young girls going for NE female hunters (probably the nicer looking accessories, funky looking bow=handbag :P).

item.description: I need to join your server, bro. Maybe that'll keep me playing. ;)
